title: ICT ATM Model – Open Gap Magnet Concept
description: Deep dive into the gap magnet concept and how price is drawn to open gaps.
content:
In this lesson, you'll learn:

• Gap magnet concept definition
• Open gap formation between sessions
• Why price returns to gaps
• Gap fill probability factors
• Trading the gap with structure
• Time-based gap model application

quiz.question: Gap magnet concept implies price is drawn to:
quiz.explanation: Gap magnet principle states price is attracted to return to and fill open gaps.

quiz.question: Open gap typically forms between:
quiz.explanation: Open gaps form between trading sessions (e.g., weekend gaps, overnight gaps).

quiz.question: Gap fill probability increases when:
quiz.explanation: Gaps with liquidity alignment have higher probability of being filled.

quiz.question: Trading the gap requires:
quiz.explanation: Trading gaps should be done with structural confirmation, not blindly.

quiz.question: Gap magnet works best with:
quiz.explanation: Gap magnet is most effective when combined with time-based model principles.
